t: LEGO The Powerpuff Girls | Powerpuff Girls Wiki | Fandom
s: March 10, 2025 - LEGO The Powerpuff Girls is the name of licensed playsets made by Danish building toy company LEGO based on the 2016 incarnation of The Powerpuff Girls cartoon. The Powerpuff Girls was first part of the LEGO Dimensions line, but got its own line in August 2018.[1] New pictures of the sets were ...
